ui_surfaces.navigation_path: Settings > Profiler > Active Collectors > WMI Collector

inputs.name: Enable WMI Collector
inputs.help_text: Enable or disable the WMI Collector for Windows endpoint profiling.

inputs.name: WMI Scan Interval
inputs.help_text: Set the interval (in minutes) for running WMI scans.

inputs.name: WMI Credentials
inputs.help_text: Provide the credentials required for WMI scans.

actions.description: Initiates a manual WMI scan to collect detailed information about Windows endpoints.

constraints.constraint: WMI Collector is only applicable for Windows endpoints.

errors.resolution: Ensure the correct username and password are entered for WMI scans.

errors.description: WMI scan interval out of range.
errors.resolution: Set the interval between 1 and 1440 minutes.

steps: Navigate to Settings > Profiler > Active Collectors.
